room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Escape It Grandview in Columbus
review: Fun experience in the Speakeasy room! The guys who run the business were very nice and informative!

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Escape It Grandview in Columbus
review: Great 1920's room. Rooms were hard but not too hard. The game was very creative and well put together. The owner Rob was very helpful and a great game host. We will be back to do more rooms when they open up!

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Escape It Grandview in Columbus
review: We had so much fun yesterday trying to escape the Speakeasy at Escape It Grandview! I would definitely recommend this place to someone else. It was super well-run and the room was set up excellently to meet the Speakeasy theme. There were 6 of us that worked to solve the puzzles and it seemed like just the right amount. We had a great time!!

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Escape It Grandview in Columbus
review: A group of 8 of us visited this escape room last evening and it was one of the best escapes I have participated. We had so much fun trying to escape the Speakeasy at Escape It Grandview! I would definitely recommend this place to all!!!! It was very well managed. You can tell there was so much time and attention in the set up of this room. Can't wait for his second room to open!
